item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: Veteran singer P Jayachandran passes away at 80 - The News Minute
item.description:
Veteran Singer P Jayachandran Passes Away at 80

Date: January 9, 2023 | Source: Local News

Veteran playback singer P Jayachandran passed away at the age of 80 in Thrissur. Known for his unmatched voice, he sang in multiple languages and was fondly referred to as 'bhaavagayakan'.

  • Jayachandran had a career spanning nearly six decades, recording over 15,000 songs.
  • He received the National Film Award for Best Male Playback Singer in 1985.
  • His notable collaborations include legends like G Devarajan and AR Rahman.
  • He was awarded the JC Daniel award in 2020 for his contributions to cinema.
  • Jayachandran also appeared as an actor in films including 'Nakhakshathangal' and 'Trivandrum Lodge'.
“His mastery over classical music and emotive singing left an indelible mark on the industry.”

Jayachandran's legacy will live on through his immense contribution to Indian music and cinema.

item.title: Playback singer P Jayachandran passes away - Mathrubhumi English
item.description:
Playback Singer P Jayachandran Passes Away at 80

Publication Date: N/A Source: Mathrubhumi

P Jayachandran, the legendary playback singer, known for his romantic voice, passed away in Thrissur after battling cancer. He was 80 years old and had recorded over 16,000 songs across various languages.

  • P Jayachandran passed away in a private hospital in Thrissur.
  • He recorded over 16,000 songs in multiple languages throughout his career.
  • Worked with prominent composers such as G. Devarajan and A. R. Rahman.
  • Received numerous accolades including the National Film Award for Best Male Playback Singer in 1986.
  • Born on March 3, 1944, in Ravipuram, Kochi, he came from a musical family.
“He was regarded as one of the greatest Malayalam singers, leaving a significant impact on Indian music.”

The passing of P Jayachandran marks a great loss for the Indian music industry, celebrating a celebrated career and a legacy that will be remembered.

item.title: Love and War: Ranbir-Vicky Kaushal shoot for intense scenes - 123telugu
item.description:
Love and War: Ranbir-Vicky Kaushal shoot for intense scenes

Published on Jan 9, 2025 7:01 pm IST

The upcoming film titled Love and War, directed by Sanjay Leela Bhansali, features Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt, and Vicky Kaushal. The stars are currently filming intense confrontation scenes in Mumbai.

  • The film marks a departure for Bhansali, who is known for period dramas, as it has a contemporary setting.
  • Love and War is set to be released on March 20, 2026, and features a triangular love story.
  • Ranbir Kapoor plays the main villain in this intense drama.
  • Bhansali has developed a powerful subject for this film, hinting at deep emotional narratives.

As anticipation builds for the release, the film's contemporary theme and the combination of talent suggest it could be a significant addition to Bhansali's filmography.

item.title: 5 remarkable brother-sister duos in International Cricket - India.com
item.description:
5 Remarkable Brother-Sister Duos in International Cricket

Date: Unknown  Source: India.com

In this gallery, we will explore various brother-sister duos who have performed in international cricket.

  • Laura Delany and Gareth Delany have both represented Ireland.
  • The Joyce family from Ireland has contributed five cricketers to the sport.
  • Will Sutherland has represented the Melbourne Renegades, while his sister Annabel debuted for Australia.
  • Gustav and Ines Mckeon have both competed for France.
  • Bas de Leede has played for the Netherlands, alongside his cousin Babette.

item.title: Nora Fatehi Evacuates With Her Team As Los Angeles Wildfires Escalate: 'This is Insane' - News18
item.description:
Nora Fatehi Evacuates With Her Team As Los Angeles Wildfires Escalate: 'This is Insane'

Date: January 09, 2025 | Source: News18

Actor and dancer Nora Fatehi has opened up about her harrowing experience amid the ongoing wildfires in Los Angeles. Taking to Instagram, Nora shared her situation, revealing that she and her team were ordered to evacuate due to the escalating crisis.

  • Nora stated on Instagram, “I am in LA and the wildfires are crazy. I have never seen anything like that. This is insane, we just got an evacuation order five minutes ago.”
  • She expressed her hope of catching her flight while evacuating, saying, “I really hope I can catch it.”
  • The wildfires, particularly affecting the Pacific Palisades, have already resulted in five fatalities, over 1,500 buildings destroyed, and the evacuation of more than 100,000 residents.
  • Other celebrities, including Priyanka Chopra, have expressed their support for those affected, highlighting the severity of the situation.
  • The fires have resulted in significant challenges for firefighters due to hurricane-force winds aiding the rapid spread of flames.
“This s**t is scary. I am going to keep you guys updated. I hope people are safe, I have never seen anything before like this.”

The ongoing crisis has received widespread attention, with efforts being made to mitigate the increasing threat posed by the wildfires.

item.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Arsh leaves Mrunmayee in a terrible state, but Ashika refuses to believe it - India Forums
item.description:
Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Mrunmayee Reveals Shocking Assault by Arsh

Published: Thursday, January 9, 2025 at 12:58 PM

The upcoming episode of Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin features a devastated Mrunmayee arriving at the Thakkars' home, revealing the trauma inflicted by Arsh during a calculated attack.

  • Mrunmayee shows visible signs of assault, including bruises and torn clothes.
  • She names Arsh as her assailant, shocking everyone, especially Ashika.
  • Savi and Isha support Mrunmayee and encourage her to seek justice.
  • Ashika vehemently denies the allegations, defending Arsh's character.
  • Savi confronts Ashika about her insensitivity towards Mrunmayee's claims.
Mrunmayee states, "I won't hesitate to kill him if he dares to touch me again."

The episode underscores themes of victimization, denial, and the complexities of interpersonal relationships amidst a backdrop of emotional turmoil.

item.title: ‘It’s a Fight Between Me, Myself and I’: Jennie Goes Deep on Crafting Her Solo Album - Billboard
item.description:
‘It’s a Fight Between Me, Myself and I’: Jennie Goes Deep on Crafting Her Solo Album

Publication Date: October 25, 2024 Source: Billboard

Jennie, known for her role in Blackpink, shares her journey of crafting her long-anticipated solo album. The process has been both rewarding and challenging as she explores her identity and artistic vision.

  • Jennie is balancing the launch of her new label and her solo debut while preparing for Blackpink's reunion.
  • She describes the creative process as a personal struggle, emphasizing her desire for perfection.
  • Her debut album reflects her growth and transition from being a group member to a solo artist.
  • Jennie collaborated with Columbia Records and shared insights into her songwriting and production process.
“I’m just trying to make sure everything is perfectly done.” - Jennie

The article highlights Jennie's commitment to her music and the pressures that come with being a solo artist after years of being part of a successful group.

item.title: Jennie: Photos From the Billboard Cover Shoot - Billboard
item.description:
Jennie: Photos From the Billboard Cover Shoot

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Billboard

Jennie is gearing up for her solo album release alongside Blackpink’s reunion. Despite the pressures, she is committed to perfection.

  • Jennie is launching her own label and solo debut album.
  • She enjoys planning but finds it challenging amidst her busy schedule.
  • Recent interviews highlight her self-awareness and quest for perfection.
  • Pressure mounts for her to release the highly anticipated album.
“I like planning parties. I like creating an album,” Jennie said.

The excitement around Jennie's upcoming projects is palpable, marking a significant milestone in her career.

item.title: Game Changer Global Box Office Preview: Ram Charan and Kiara Advani film flirts with Rs 100 crore opening day - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Game Changer Global Box Office Preview: Ram Charan and Kiara Advani film flirts with Rs 100 crore opening day

Publication Date: January 09, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

After the historic success of RRR, Ram Charan's new film Game Changer, directed by Shankar, is set for release and is expected to generate impressive box office numbers.

  • Advance bookings have reportedly reached Rs 32 crore in India.
  • The film is projected to earn between Rs 90 crore to Rs 100 crore on the opening day.
  • Key markets include Andhra Pradesh and Telangana, with expected earnings of Rs 60 crore to Rs 65 crore.
  • The global advance total is estimated to be around Rs 40 to Rs 45 crore.
“Given the present sale of tickets and the excitement among the cine-goers, Game Changer is looking to open in the range of Rs 90.00 crore to Rs 100.00 crore.”

The success of Game Changer will significantly depend on audience reception in the coming days, particularly during the festive period.

item.title: Sonu Sood says he is 'not on talking terms' with Kangana Ranaut after 'Manikarnika': 'I feel that it’s he - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Sonu Sood says he is 'not on talking terms' with Kangana Ranaut after 'Manikarnika': 'I feel that it’s her foolishness...'

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Times of India

In a recent statement, actor Sonu Sood revealed that he is no longer on speaking terms with Kangana Ranaut following their collaboration on the film 'Manikarnika'. He expressed his views on her behavior, labeling it as "foolishness".

  • Sonu Sood and Kangana Ranaut worked together on the film 'Manikarnika'.
  • Their professional relationship has soured since the film's release.
  • Sood criticized Ranaut's conduct as foolish, indicating a personal rift.
“I feel that it’s her foolishness...” - Sonu Sood

The ongoing tension between the two actors highlights the complexities of relationships within the film industry.

item.title: Hrithik Roshan would like to work with Rajinikanth again after Bhagwaan Dada: ‘Will realise the burden and weight of it’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Hrithik Roshan Looks Back on Working with Rajinikanth in Bhagwaan Dada

Date: Jan 09, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Bollywood star Hrithik Roshan reminisced about his time as a child actor alongside Rajinikanth in the 1986 film Bhagwaan Dada. He expressed admiration for Rajinikanth's gentle nature and kindness during their time working together.

  • Hrithik worked with Rajinikanth as a child in the film Bhagwaan Dada.
  • He described Rajinikanth as “the greatest legend of all time” and spoke about his gentleness.
  • Hrithik mentioned how Rajinikanth would take the blame for his mistakes to keep him comfortable.
  • The conversation occurred during the trailer launch of Netflix's upcoming docu-series, The Roshans.
  • The docu-series explores the legacy of the Roshan family in cinema.
  • The Roshans premieres on Netflix on January 17.
“I will realise the burden and the weight of the moment that I am sharing screen space with him... He was so gentle and so giving.” - Hrithik Roshan

This nostalgic reflection highlights the warm memories Hrithik holds of his early experiences in film and his respect for Rajinikanth, showcasing the impact such early interactions can have on an actor's career.

item.title: Bachchala Malli locks its OTT release date - 123telugu
item.description:
Bachchala Malli Locks Its OTT Release Date

Published on: January 9, 2025, 5:54 pm IST

The film Bachchala Malli, featuring Allari Naresh, is set for its OTT release on ETV Win starting January 10, 2025. Despite mixed reviews, Naresh's performance has been notably appreciated.

  • The movie was released in December 2024 and features a star-studded cast including Amritha Aiyer and Rao Ramesh.
  • It will be available on three OTT platforms: Amazon Prime Video, ETV Win, and Sun NXT.
  • ETV Win confirmed the streaming start date for January 10, 2025.
  • Other platforms' streaming dates are still unconfirmed.
  • The film is produced by Hasya Movies and features music by Vishal Chandrashekhar.

Stay tuned for more updates on this release.

item.title: When Pritish Nandy stole Masaba Gupta's birth certificate to reveal her father's true identity; Neena Gupta called him a b*stard publicly - TOI Etimes
item.description:
When Pritish Nandy stole Masaba Gupta's birth certificate to reveal her father's true identity; Neena Gupta called him a b*stard publicly

Date: October 2023 | Source: Unknown

This article discusses a public controversy involving filmmaker Pritish Nandy, who reportedly took Masaba Gupta's birth certificate, leading to revelations about her father's identity, which prompted Neena Gupta to lash out publicly.

  • Pritish Nandy allegedly took Masaba Gupta's birth certificate.
  • The incident revealed Masaba's father's identity, which caused public uproar.
  • Neena Gupta publicly condemned Pritish Nandy, calling him a 'b*stard.'
  • The event sparked discussions about ethics in personal identity and public figures.
“This is an invasion of privacy and utterly disrespectful.” - Neena Gupta

This controversy highlights the ongoing concerns about privacy and respect for personal history in public discourse.

item.title: Buzz: Prabhas to announce a new film this Sankranthi 2025 - 123telugu
item.description:
Buzz: Prabhas to announce a new film this Sankranthi 2025

Published on Jan 9, 2025 by Movie Updates

Prabhas, one of India's biggest film stars, is expected to announce his next project on January 14, 2025, as buzz grows in the film industry.

  • Currently taking a break due to an injury from filming his new movie, Fauji.
  • The official announcement regarding the new project will include the director and production details.
  • Fans are eagerly awaiting news regarding the collaboration for the upcoming film.
“Stay tuned for more updates!”

This announcement is generating considerable excitement among fans and industry insiders.
